channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Flytipping in alley next to Sternhall Lane, 23rd November
item.description:
Rubbish is always dumped in this alley next to Sternhall Lane. Recently someone put a couple of bins there but they are always overflowing and other rubbish is dumped there. We donâ€™t report it all the time but it is particularly bad now

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Sternhall Lane, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole at the end of the junction entering the roundabout, 23rd November
item.description:
This pothole has been here for at least a month and it seems to be getting wider. I keep hitting it each week since it's very difficult to avoid.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Big cracks from one side to the other, 23rd November
item.description:
Every time a heavy vehicle or a buses goes over the crack it vibrates through the house and makes the radiators vibrate the road looks like its sinking and big cracks are appearing.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Mickleham Road, St Paul's Cray, Greater London

item.title: Lime blocking pavement, 23rd November

item.title: Rubbish Flytipped and Litter Accumulating, 23rd November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 33, Seymour Villas, Anerley, Greater London

item.title: Waste water causing slippery surface, ice when below 0, 23rd November
item.description:
Water continues to run off of this property on to Mackenzie Road causing obstruction to the pavement and a slip hazard. This has previously been reported at least three times: Report reference: 7408705 and 7445556 and 5901776 You have previously deferred to Thames Water who clearly haven't been able to fix the issue or take action.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mackenzie Road, Anerley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
